com.example.buber.Services

Class ApplicationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.buber.Services.ApplicationService

  • public class ApplicationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the service layer of our application. All interactions with database occur here Handles communication between MVC frontend and database. TODO: Better error handling and refactoring to improve cohesion.

      • createNewUser

        public static void createNewUser(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String password,
                                 java.lang.String firstName,
                                 java.lang.String lastName,
                                 java.lang.String email,
                                 java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                 User.TYPE type,
                                 EventCompletionListener controllerListener)
        Calls the DBManger class to create a user in Firebase. On success the listener gets the trip object. On failure the listener returns the exception
        Parameters:
        username,password,firstName,lastName,email,phoneNumber,type - The users information
        controllerListener - the listener that gets results from the Firebase call.

      • loginUser

        public static void loginUser(java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String password,
                             User.TYPE type,
                             EventCompletionListener controllerListener)
        Calls the AuthDBManager class to login a user. On success the listener returns the driver or rider object. On failure the listener returns the exception
        Parameters:
        email,password,type - The users information
        controllerListener - the listener that gets results from the Firebase call.

      • createNewTrip

        public static void createNewTrip(Trip tripRequest,
                                 EventCompletionListener controllerListener)
        Calls the DBManger class to create a trip in Firebase. On success the listener returns the trip object. On failure the listener returns the exception
        Parameters:
        tripRequest - the trip object created
        controllerListener - the listener that gets results from the Firebase call.

      • getFilteredTrips

        public static void getFilteredTrips(UserLocation driverLocation,
                                    EventCompletionListener controllerListener)
        Calls the DBManager class to get the trips filtered by geolocation. On success the listener returns a list of filteredTripsData. On failure the listener returns the exception.
        Parameters:
        driverLocation - the center location for the geosearch
        controllerListener - the listener that gets results from the Firebase call.

      • getSessionTripForUser

        public static void notifyDriverForPickup(java.lang.String uid,
